participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, enjoys quiet moments and has a zest for life through travel.
participant_1.background: i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel. i have visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i'm 60 years old.

participant_2.name: Walter
participant_2.personality: playful and nostalgic, with a love for life and a sense of humor about aging.
participant_2.background: i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.

content.text: hello how are you?
hello , how are you doing this morning ? i just finished walking my dog .
what is the name of your dog?
mickey ! he's such a cute thing . do you go to school ?
no i am old
oh i see . i am really reliable in my job on other things i am not. what are you up to today ?
i was at the book store for ages
i like book stores , but they need to open earlier , i'm always ready to go. Also, try to guess: i really like ...
shopping ?
to travel, funny you :)
where did you travel last?
i worked at a bank . . . its not as bad as it sounds , i promise ðŸ˜‡
you like money? :)
i make more dancing on the weekends
i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
vegetarianism is what i do. Also, try to guess: i have visited ...
spain?
spain times, funny you :)
do you like drinking alcohol?
haha i'm really not a big drinker. how are you tonight ?
